About Room Information

Room type Rate
Premier room 41,000
Luxury tent 47,000
Royal tent 1,00,000
Luxury villa with private pool 2,35,000
Kohinoor villa with private pool 2,50,000

About our Suites:

  • Each suite is luxurious, spacious and beautifully designed.
  • DVD players and high-speed internet access.
  • All guests are offered a choice of 16 pillows, four duvets, a variety ofmattresses.
  • In-suite check-in service.
  • We will unpack your bags upon arrival and then re-pack them when you depart.
  • Our valet will be pleased to press the clothes you wish to wear for the evening of your arrival.
  • You can enjoy complimentary Full English Breakfast in the comfort of your suite, or in HIX Mayfair.
  • You will have complimentary access to any mobile phone for any local calls you may wish to make.
  • You will also have complimentary local calls from your suite, complimentary internet access.
